definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: The music was fine, but the book was very poor.
sentences.chinese: 音乐是出色的，但是唱词很糟。

sentences.english: You know, in one lifetime you can't learn everything that's good.
sentences.chinese: 要知道，人的一生不可能将所有的事情都学得很出色。

sentences.english: He outshone his fellow pupils in every skill.
sentences.chinese: 他在各种技能上都比他的同学更出色。

sentences.english: Li Yu and Aina Jushi is the best writer In the short vernacular fiction novel writing In the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李渔和艾衲居士是清代最出色的短篇白话小说作家。

sentences.english: I think he will be the best of the best.
sentences.chinese: 我认为，他将会成为出色球员中的佼佼者。

sentences.english: I was pleasantly surprised to find several well-established open source initiatives.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴地发现了几个出色的开放源码项目。

sentences.english: In the men's team final, Hungary team to play extremely well.
sentences.chinese: 在男子团体决赛中，匈牙利队的发挥非常出色。
他是出色的高尔夫球手。

sentences.english: But then this was one of the most remarkable restaurants I have ever eaten in.
sentences.chinese: 但这里是我曾品尝过的最出色的餐厅之一。

sentences.english: On the one hand, I can see that this is a pretty cool gadget.
sentences.chinese: 从这方面讲，我认为它是一个相当出色的小把戏。

sentences.english: High performing teams do an excellent job of "on-boarding" the new team member(s).
sentences.chinese: 高绩效团队在帮助新人融入方面也做得很出色。

sentences.english: He did very well, but failed to break the record.
sentences.chinese: 他作的很出色，但未破记录。

sentences.english: She has good leadership skills and organizing abilities.
sentences.chinese: 颂燕拥有出色的领导才能及组织能力。

sentences.english: Henrik Westberg is a gifted healer of ascension.
sentences.chinese: 是一名出色的提升疗愈者。

sentences.english: They're often tasted dry instead of being acidic, with good structured and restrained personality.
sentences.chinese: 口感通常较干但不会过酸，酒体结构出色，风格收敛。

sentences.english: Li Yundi's piano performance is really fantastic. ;
sentences.chinese: 李云迪的钢琴表演实在是太出色了。

definition: to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
to show/to show off/to display/to manifest/expression/manifestation/show/display/performance (at work etc)/behavior
